item.title: The Easier Way to Create a Map of Norway Using {splmaps}
item.description: p.announcement { border-radius: 5px; background-color: #acc8d4; padding: 1em; } p.announcement code { background-color: #93b8c8 } This post was updated to include the new {splmaps} package since the {fhimaps} and {fhidata} package will no longer receive updates. Practically, these apps will behave the same way. Installation instructions for the {splmaps} and {spldata} packages can be found here. Every now and then you discover a discover a much simpler solution to a problem you spent a lot of time solving.
